section.title: Economy Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 3-star beachfront hotel, and access to public beaches and hiking trails. Affordable dining options included.

section.title: Mid-range Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 4-star resort stay with pool and spa access, a guided snorkeling tour, and tickets to a traditional Hawaiian luau.

section.title: Luxury Package
section.p: First-class airfare, 5-star luxury resort, private helicopter tours, personal beach cabana service, and fine dining experiences.
